fw.name: KinematicsInterfaces

class.name: Dressup
class.abstract: Interface to access the Dressup object.

method.name: Attach
method.abstract: Attaches a given product to a link of the mechanism pointed by the dressup.

method.name: Detach
method.abstract: Detaches an attached product from its link.

method.name: ListAttached
method.abstract: Returns the list of products attached to a given link.

method.name: Context
method.abstract: Returns the context product on which the mechanism is defined.

method.name: Mechanism
method.abstract: Returns the mechanism on which a dressup is applied.

class.name: Dressups
class.abstract: A collection of all Dressup entities currently managed by the application.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Creates a new Dressup and adds it to the Dressups collection.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a Dressup using its index or its name from the Dressups collection.

method.name: ListMechanismsContext
method.abstract: Each mechanism of the list given by ListPossibleMechanisms has a context product on which it is defined.

method.name: ListPossibleMechanisms
method.abstract: Returns information about all possible mechanisms on which a dressup can be created.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a Dressup from the Dressups collection.

class.name: Joint
class.abstract: Interface to manage the Joint object.

method.name: UnsetLowerLimit1
method.abstract: Unsets the lower limit of the joint, for the first parameter.

method.name: UnsetLowerLimit2
method.abstract: Unsets the lower limit of the joint, for the second parameter.

method.name: UnsetUpperLimit1
method.abstract: Unsets the upper limit of the joint, for the first parameter.

method.name: UnsetUpperLimit2
method.abstract: Unsets the upper limit of the joint, for the second parameter.

method.name: CurrentValue1
method.abstract: Gets the joint current value for first parameter.

method.name: CurrentValue2
method.abstract: Gets the joint current value for second parameter.

method.name: LowerLimit1
method.abstract: Gets or returns the lower limit of the joint, for the first parameter.

method.name: LowerLimit2
method.abstract: Gets or returns the lower limit of the joint, for the second parameter.

method.name: Type
method.abstract: Returns the joint type.

method.name: UpperLimit1
method.abstract: Gets or returns the upper limit of the joint, for the first parameter.

method.name: UpperLimit2
method.abstract: Gets or returns the upper limit of the joint, for the second parameter.

class.name: Joints
class.abstract: A collection of all Joint entities currently managed by the application.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Create a new Joint and adds it to the Joints collection.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a Joint using its index or its name from the Joints collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Remove a Joint from the Joints collection.

class.name: KinematicsWorkbench
class.abstract: Interface to access all Kinematics entities.

method.name: Mechanisms
method.abstract: Returns the Mechanisms collection.

class.name: Mechanism
class.abstract: Interface to access the Mechanism object.

method.name: AddCommand
method.abstract: Adds a command in the mechanism, on a joint.

method.name: AddJoint
method.abstract: Adds a joint in the mechanism.

method.name: GetCommandValues
method.abstract: Allows to retrieve current state of the mechanism.

method.name: GetProduct
method.abstract: Returns an item from the list of the products involved in the mechanism.

method.name: GetProductMotion
method.abstract: Retrieves motion from initial state to current state for a part of the mechanism.

method.name: PutCommandValues
method.abstract: Triggers immediate mechanism solving (motion is NOT applied to the model).

method.name: PutCommandValuesWithMultiSteps
method.abstract: Puts command values in given number of steps.

method.name: ResetCmdValueToZero
method.abstract: Sets the command value to zero for the given command without disturbing part positions.

method.name: Update
method.abstract: Reassembles the mechanism after dimension changes in the parts.

method.name: Commands
method.abstract: Returns the collection of commands in the mechanism.

method.name: FixedPart
method.abstract: Returns or sets the fixed part of the mechanism.

method.name: Joints
method.abstract: Returns the collection of joints in the mechanism.

method.name: NbCommands
method.abstract: Returns the number of commands in the mechanism.

method.name: NbDof
method.abstract: Returns the degree of freedom of the mechanism.

method.name: NbJoints
method.abstract: Returns the number of joints in the mechanism.

method.name: NbProducts
method.abstract: Returns the number of products (i.

class.name: MechanismCommand
class.abstract: Interface to access the Command object (in Kinematics context).

method.name: CurrentValue
method.abstract: Returns the current value for a command.

method.name: Type
method.abstract: Returns the command type.

class.name: MechanismCommands
class.abstract: A collection of all MechanismCommand entities currently managed by the application.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Creates a new MechanismCommand and adds it to the MechanismCommands collection.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a MechanismCommand using its index or its name from the Commands collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Remove a MechanismCommand from the MechanismCommands collection.

class.name: Mechanisms
class.abstract: A collection of all Mechanism entities currently managed by the application.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Creates a new Mechanism and adds it to the Mechanisms collection.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a Mechanism using its index or its name from the Mechanisms collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a Mechanism from the Mechanisms collection.
